attributes.action: Stop the “no jab, no job” scheme coming in
attributes.additional_details: Feel like we’re been pressured into something that no one really knows much  about or wants to do. Who are you to tell us we won’t have a job if we don’t get the jab? We’re more than happy to follow the guidelines and PPE, it’s just many of us don’t want to have the jab for one reason or another.
attributes.background: Stop trying to force the jab on people who don’t want it. It’s our body and health on the line, you shouldn’t scrutinise us for been cautious or having our own thoughts. This is still a free country right?

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957

If you want the Government to take an action different to the above, you could start a new petition stating clearly what you want the Government to do.
